mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GEN2_CONFIG( ID, AUTHOR, VERSION, CAMEL_CASE, BASE_PACKAGE, MODULE_NAME, DATABASE_ID, STATUS, "desc", UPDATE_VERSION, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{author}, #{version}, #{camel_case}, #{base_package}, #{module_name}, #{database_id}, #{status}, #{desc}, (select COALESCE(max(update_version),0)+1 from GEN2_CONFIG), #{update_time} )

INSERT INTO GEN2_CONFIG( ID, AUTHOR, VERSION, CAMEL_CASE, BASE_PACKAGE, MODULE_NAME, DATABASE_ID, STATUS, `desc`, UPDATE_VERSION, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{author}, #{version}, #{camel_case}, #{base_package}, #{module_name}, #{database_id}, #{status}, #{desc}, #{update_version}, #{update_time} )

insert into GEN2_CONFIG( ID, AUTHOR, VERSION, CAMEL_CASE, BASE_PACKAGE, MODULE_NAME, DATABASE_ID, STATUS, "DESC", UPDATE_VERSION, UPDATE_TIME ) values ( #{id}, #{author}, #{version}, #{camel_case}, #{base_package}, #{module_name}, #{database_id}, #{status}, #{desc}, (SELECT COALESCE(max(update_version),0)+1 FROM GEN2_CONFIG), #{update_time} )
